ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
Celebrate BroadSword Comics' 6th Year Anniversary with the telling of " Between Two Worlds". Tarot reveals the mysterious double life that all Witches must secretly lead. Plus a Bonus mini story featuring the first appearance of Jim Balent's new character the lovable hexy Witch "Spellarella"! As always this Issue ships to stores equally with 2 Jim Balent covers.
This issue includes a backup story: "Turbulence", starring Spellarella
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-15 22:26:21. [CVDB121816]
